description: This file defines a global exception handler for a Spring Boot application, specifically handling custom and generic exceptions and returning appropriate HTTP responses.

classes.name: GlobalExceptionHandler
classes.description: A Spring Boot exception handler class that intercepts exceptions thrown in the application to provide custom HTTP responses.

methods.name: handleGlobalException
methods.description: Handles custom SimpleBankingGlobalException and constructs a ResponseEntity with error details.

methods.name: handleException
methods.description: Handles generic exceptions and returns a ResponseEntity with a message indicating an error occurred.
